    • Method Detail

      • autorun

        public static void autorun()
        The calls in this method are performed at program start *after* GUI has been established. You can think of it as a functional startup batch.

      • addRandomMirror

        public static void addRandomMirror(org.jpws.pwslib.data.ContextFile file)
        Marks a random mirror filepath for global persistence.
        Parameters:
        file - ContextFile mirror file definition

      • removeRandomMirror

        public static void removeRandomMirror(org.jpws.pwslib.data.ContextFile file)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes the parameter file on the medium and removes it from global random mirror list. (Random mirrors are created for databases without a filepath definition.)
        Parameters:
        file - ContextFile mirror file definition
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getRandomMirrorNames

        public static java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> getRandomMirrorNames()
        Returns an iterator over all registered random mirror names (i.e. of mirrors for new databases without path definition). The returned names are file names without path elements.
        Returns:
        Iterator of String

      • exit

        public static void exit(boolean save)
        Initiates termination of the program by optionally invoking emergencySave on currently loaded files. (EmergencySave attempts to save the files unconditionally.)

        Note: If save is true, a failing emergency save will prevent shutdown of the program.

        Parameters:
        save - if true all modified loaded files (desktop) get saved before exit

      • exit

                        boolean fatal)
        Initiates termination of the program after display of the parameter message at System.err.
        Parameters:
        message - text to be displayed

        public static long getClipboardTime()
        The time elapsed since the latest transfer to the system clipboard. If there is no transfer defined, or it has been cleared previously, 0 is returned.

      • delay

        public static void delay(long millis)
        Causes the current thread to sleep the specified number of milliseconds.

      • requestSemaphoreAccess

        public static boolean requestSemaphoreAccess(java.lang.String name,
                                             java.lang.Object object)
        Requests and registers an exclusive access for the parameter semaphore definition. Once a value true is returned, the closure of the semaphore remains active until method releaseSemaphoreAccess() is called to revoke. The semaphore may be restricted to a specific object. If null is given for the object, the semaphore is valid for ANY other request, otherwise only for request with the same object.
        Parameters:
        name - String semaphore name
        object - Object optional object restriction of semaphore; may be null for GENERAL access
        Returns:
        true if and only if access is permitted and reserved for the given object

      • isSemaphoreClosed

        public static boolean isSemaphoreClosed(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.Object object)
        Tests for the existence of a closed semaphore for the parameter name and object.
        Parameters:
        name - String semaphore name
        object - Object optional object restriction of semaphore; may be null for GENERAL access
        Returns:
        true if and only if the semaphore for the given object is closed. If object is null, ANY occurrence of name in the map will return true.

      • releaseSemaphoreAccess

        public static void releaseSemaphoreAccess(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.Object object)
        Terminates a semaphore access reservation.
        Parameters:
        name - String semaphore name
        object - Object optional object restriction of semaphore; may be null for GENERAL access

        AddDialog

      • isEditingRecord

        public static boolean isEditingRecord()
        Whether there is currently a database entry being edited (whether there is an open editor dialog).
        Returns:
        boolean true == open editor dialog
